channel.title: 1st on Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville
channel.description: Recent content in 1st on Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville

item.title: Minecraft 2-Day Winter Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: ‚ùÑÔ∏è MINECRAFT WINTER WONDERLAND CAMP ‚ùÑÔ∏è A Fun-Filled 2-Day Adventure for Young Builders! üéÆ CALLING ALL YOUNG ADVENTURERS Join us for an exciting journey into a snowy Minecraft world! Perfect for both new and experienced players ages 7-10. ‚öíÔ∏è EXCITING ACTIVITIES: ‚Ä¢ Build magical snow castles and cozy winter cottages ‚Ä¢ Create your own winter village with friends ‚Ä¢ Learn cool building tricks and secrets ‚Ä¢ Play friendly snowball games

item.title: Roblox 2-Day Winter Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join our kid-friendly Roblox camp designed specifically for grades 1-4. Create your very own carnival game in a fun, supportive environment where imagination meets basic coding skills. What Your Child Will Learn: Simple drag-and-drop game building Basic Roblox Studio tools Creative design choices Teamwork and problem-solving Game testing basics Fun Activities: Design colorful magic spells Place carnival games and decorations Create simple challenges Test games with classmates Earn special Roblox itemsBefore and after care is available!

item.title: Before Camp Care | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Start the day with ease through our Before-Camp Care program! Perfect for early risers or families with busy morning schedules, this program provides a safe, welcoming space where campers can enjoy fun activities, quiet games, or simply prepare for the exciting day ahead.

item.title: After Camp Care | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Need a little extra time after camp ends? Our After-Camp Care program is here to help! Designed for busy families, this extended care option offers a safe, fun, and engaging environment for campers to unwind after a full day of activities. With games, creative projects, and supervised free play, your child will continue to have a great time while you handle your afternoon schedule stress-free.

item.title: Block Coding with Beavers | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Students learn sequencing, repetition, problem-solving, and conditional logic while developing practical coding skills. The course employs a hands-on, gamified approach that gradually increases in complexity, allowing each child to advance at their own speed. By the end, students can create sophisticated programs, having built a strong foundation in coding and computational thinking. We start to learn fundamental coding concepts by helping a beaver build a dam! The learning continues with learning to code games in Scratch.

item.title: Chess Tactics and Games | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: We are excited to start a chess program for our more dedicated players, who are ready to learn more about the game and improve their skills. The classes start at 10 am with a 45 minutes lesson, followed by three 15-minute games. The pickup time is 12:00. The classes are held at Blue Ridge Boost and are taught by Daniel Wurtzer. Hello my name is Daniel Wurzer and I am excited to teach chess lessons at Blue Ridge Boost this fall.

item.title: Chess Tactics and Games | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: We are excited to start a chess program for our more dedicated players, who are ready to learn more about the game and improve their skills. Hello my name is Daniel Wurzer and I am excited to teach chess lessons at Blue Ridge Boost this fall.

item.title: First Lego League Explore | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Dive into an exciting new season of FIRST LEGO League with the 2024-2025 theme: SUBMERGED! This year‚Äôs challenge invites participants to explore the mysteries and wonders of underwater environments while solving real-world challenges related to oceans, lakes, and waterways. Participate in the official First Lego League Explore program Work on collaborative projects with peers Learn about real-world applications of robotics and engineering This class is perfect for budding engineers and curious minds ready to take their first steps into the world of robotics!

item.title: Lego Robots Jr | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This four-class sequence introduces the students to the world of robotics and coding. Students will construct Lego models that use motors and lights and create code to bring their creations to life. This class is suitable for students with no previous experience using Lego robots. Introducing the Next Generation of Coders! The Fundamentals of Coding with SPIKE Essential is the fun and engaging way to teach your elementary students essential STEM skills.

item.title: Minecraft Education for Elementary School | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: üéÆ Start Your Minecraft Adventure! üéÆ Join our beginner-friendly class and dive into the world of Minecraft! What You'll Learn: üèóÔ∏è Building Basics: Master the essentials of crafting and construction. üåø Survival Skills: Learn how to gather resources and thrive in survival mode. üó∫Ô∏è Exploration Tips: Discover exciting biomes and hidden treasures. üë• Multiplayer Fun: Connect with others and enjoy cooperative gameplay. Free pizza included!

item.title: 1-Day Camp; Apr 18, 2025 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join us for an exhilarating exploration of robotics, coding, chess, and math. Teamwork and collaboration are at the heart of our camp experience. Students will have the opportunity to work together, share ideas, and solve challenges. Through hands-on activities and group projects, students will develop critical thinking skills and learn the importance of effective communication.

item.title: Girl Powered Fridays on 2025-01-10 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Designed to empower girls in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM)! We welcome girls and their supporters to an evening of innovation and discovery. Fuel your creativity with complimentary pizza and dessert. Together, let's break barriers and build a future where girls thrive in STEM fields!

item.title: Parents Night Out on 2025-01-31 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Roblox and STEM Adventure Night! Give your young geniuses an evening of fun and learning! Drop off your kids (ages 6 to 10) for an exciting adventure in: Roblox: Explore problem-solving, creativity, and collaboration through the world of Roblox! Build, play, and learn in a fun, interactive environment. Gaming: Engage in exciting games that encourage teamwork and strategic thinking. Robotics: Unleash their creativity with hands-on tech activities. Coding: Develop logical thinking and innovation with beginner-friendly programming challenges.

item.title: Parents Night Out on 2025-02-28 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Give your young geniuses an evening of fun and learning! Drop off your kids (ages 6 to 10) for an exciting adventure in: Chess: Sharpen their critical thinking skills through strategic challenges. Gaming: Explore problem-solving and collaboration through play. Robotics: Unleash their creativity with hands-on tech using VEX Robotics, where innovation meets fun! Coding: Dive into logical thinking and innovation with beginner-friendly programming activities.

Gaming: Engage in exciting games that encourage teamwork and strategic thinking. Robotics: Explore problem-solving and innovation through fun tech activities. Coding: Develop logical thinking and innovation with beginner-friendly programming challenges.

item.title: Spring Break Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Sphero robots in the morning and Scratch coding in the afternoon.
